ch0114_40_natsume/0101_0701_02_10:
Beginnings are very important. Let’s make sure this
new day gets off to a good start.
ch0114_40_natsume/7101_0701_01_10:
Even if someone told me they had the power
to grant me a wish, I don’t think I’d wish
for anything.
ch0114_40_natsume/7101_0701_02_10:
If you get something you want without working for
it, how can you find the motivation to make your
dreams come true by yourself?
ch0114_40_natsume/7102_0701_01_10: There’s no time like now to start something new.
ch0114_40_natsume/7102_0701_02_10:
With a fresh outlook, I’m sure we could take on
any challenge.
ch0114_40_natsume/7103_0701_01_10:
This outfit might look like it’s hard to move around
in. Far from it. Now that I’m used to it, it feels as
light as a breeze.
ch0114_40_natsume/7103_0701_02_10:
What’s more, wearing it makes me feel pure of
heart and mind and ready for anything.
ch0114_40_natsume/7104_0701_01_10:
It’s strange, but something mysterious has been
happening ever since I put on this outfit...
ch0114_40_natsume/7104_0701_02_10:
I can see premonitions much more clearly—both
good and bad.
ch0114_40_natsume/7104_0701_03_10:
Do you want to know what I’ve seen in your
future? *giggle*
ch0114_40_natsume/7105_0701_01_10:
If it’s foretold that you have bad fortune in store,
don’t fret.
ch0114_40_natsume/7105_0701_02_10:
Even with my psychic powers, I can’t fully predict
what the future holds.
ch0114_40_natsume/7105_0701_03_10:
Sometimes the future can be changed. What’s
important is that you choose the destiny you want
and go all out toward making that a reality.
ch0114_40_natsume/1701_0702_01_10: It’s good luck, so be sure to use it.
ch0114_40_natsume/2501_0701_01_10:
Whenever Chingling moves, the orb inside her
mouth makes a ringing sound—like a bell.
ch0114_40_natsume/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s a wonderful, pure sound. I feel that it helps
clear my mind.
ch0114_40_natsume/2501_0702_01_10:
The ringing sound Chingling makes is beautiful,
but that’s not all...
ch0114_40_natsume/2501_0702_02_10:
She uses it to deafen her foes by emitting
high-frequency cries.
ch0114_40_natsume/2501_0702_03_10:
By doing that, she disrupts the communication
between the Pokémon that we face and their
Trainers. It’s a deceptively powerful ability.
ch0114_40_natsume/2511_0701_01_10:
Chingling and I have resolved to become the
best sync pair on Pasio.
ch0114_40_natsume/2511_0701_02_10:
But I suppose you probably made the exact
same resolution...
ch0114_40_natsume/2511_0701_03_10:
Oh dear. You don’t look like you’re going to give
up so easily. What to do?
ch0114_40_natsume/2511_0702_01_10:
Maybe it’s because of this outfit and the clear
sound of Chingling’s bell, but my psychic abilities
are at their peak.
ch0114_40_natsume/2511_0702_02_10:
I feel like I can’t lose. Let’s go out and
win together.
ch0114_40_natsume/3001_0701_01_10:
This morning is no more special than any other.
Every day is the dawn of a new beginning.
ch0114_40_natsume/3003_0701_01_10:
Wearing different clothes can really change my
mood. The occasion doesn’t matter at all—only
how I feel.
ch0114_40_natsume/3005_0701_01_10:
I think I’ll go to sleep early tonight. If I save up
some of my energy, tomorrow will feel just
as special.
